titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Social Work Month and World Social Work Day.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 3/18/2015--Introduced. Supports the goals and ideals of Social Work Month and World Social Work Day.
